thread.title: United Airlines flight attendants picket at DIA Thursday
thread.title_full: United Airlines flight attendants picket at DIA Thursday

author: Ben Miller
title: United Airlines flight attendants picket at DIA Thursday
text:
United Airlines flight attendants picket at DIA Thursday Jul 17, 2015, 6:57am MDT Share Association of Flight Attendants photo Yesterday, United Airlines flight attendants picketed at Denver International Airport andâ€¦ more Saying the airline is trying to cut their contract at a time it is earning record profits, flight attendants for United Airlines picketed at Denver International Airport on Thursday, as well as at airports around the world. "In a time of record profits United management is attempting to gut our contracts," said Association of Flight Attendants International President Sara Nelson , in a statement. The Chicago Tribune reported flight attendants also picketed at United headquarters in Chicago on Thursday. United reported record 2014 profits, helped by strong demand and low fuel prices. The airlines and the flight attendants have been working on a new contract for the past three years. Last week, United Airlines experienced a computer glitch that grounded all of its outbound flights for several hours. Ben Miller contributes to the Denver Business Journal and compiles the Morning Edition email newsletter.
